name: Stito
description:
Corrupted processes resist a shutdown order issued by the operating system kernel. Your mission is to navigate the different memories and buses of the system and investigate the source of the anomaly.

Use the directional arrows to move and jump and 'W' to shoot.

This game was developed in less than 5 days for the SELF JAM contest. Code, art and music were created for the game during the jam by myself (sorry for the crappy sound :p)
